pages.text: The $(mob)Zombie Pigman$() is a common monster found in the $(thing)Nether$(). It doesn't attack player unless it or one of its friends gets attacked first.$(p)Unlike $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombies$(), $(mob)Zombie Pigmen$() are immune to fire and always spawn wearing a $(item)Golden Sword$(), making their melees attacking even deadlier. They also do not attack $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villagers$().

Just like $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(mob)Zombies$(), $(mob)Zombie Pigmen$() drop $(l:minecraft_zombie)$(item)Rotten Flesh$() on death. They also drop $(item)Gold Nuggets$(), which can be combined to make $(item)Gold Ingots$().
